meta.title: SmarQuest — Interactive Learning Platform
meta.description: Join SmarQuest for Q&A forums, SmarQuest Forms (online exams), and easy-to-access learning materials.

hero.subtitle: A modern interactive learning platform for students, teachers, and learners — friendly with a professional touch.

items.title: For Students
items.desc: Discuss topics, find answers, and prepare for exams with classmates.

items.title: For Teachers
items.desc: Create tests, manage classes, and share materials easily.

items.title: For University
items.desc: Collaborate on projects, exchange resources, and grow academically.

items.title: For Professionals
items.desc: Share expertise, help the community, and build your reputation.

items.title: Q&A Forum
items.desc: Ask questions, provide answers, and get insights from the community and experts.

items.title: SmarQuest Forms
items.desc: Create interactive exams or quizzes with flexible options.

items.title: Learning Materials
items.desc: Access notes, summaries, and shared learning resources.

items.title: Gamification & Ranking
items.desc: Earn points, collect badges, and climb the leaderboard!

cta.title: Ready for a New Learning Experience?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of learners and educators. Sign up for free and feel the difference!

analytics.title: User Data (Live)
analytics.subtitle: Statistics are taken directly from Firestore Database.

uptime.title: System Performance
uptime.subtitle: Real-time operational status of all system endpoints.

dev.title: Platform Development
dev.subtitle: This platform is developed with AI assistance to improve efficiency, code quality, and development speed.
dev.note: AI is used for quality, speed, and reliability — not to replace human oversight.

info.title: Development Info
info.description: SmarQuest is actively developed to deliver the best experience.
info.repoLine: See development progress and contribute via our GitHub repository:

downloads.title: Search & Download Apps/Assets
downloads.noMatches: No apps or assets match your search.

about.subtitle: SmarQuest is a smart platform designed to support learning, interactive quizzes, and efficient exploration of information.

items.title: Interactive Learning
items.desc: Learn topics in an engaging way through curated questions and explanations.

items.title: Smart Ideas
items.desc: We combine technology and education to help users think critically and creatively.

items.title: Learner Community
items.desc: Get inspired and share knowledge with an active supportive learning community.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.desc: Provide flexible, enjoyable, and inclusive learning access for all learners.

vision.title: Vision
vision.desc: To be a leading digital education platform that helps the younger generation learn with spirit and creativity.

join.title: Join Us!
join.subtitle: Start your learning journey with SmarQuest today.
